mapper.sql: info_id, user_id, real_name, card_code, sex, creator, create_time, operator, operate_time
mapper.insert:
insert into t_user_info
info_id,
user_id,
real_name,
card_code,
sex,
creator,
create_time,
operator,
operate_time,
#{infoId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cardCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sex,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{creator,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{operator,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update t_user_info
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
card_code = #{cardCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
operator = #{operator,jdbcType=INTEGER},
operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where info_id = #{infoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_user_info set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, card_code = #{cardCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where info_id = #{infoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select tui.info_id,tui.user_id,tlu.user_role from t_user_info tui left join t_login_user tlu on tui.user_id=tlu.user_id where tui.card_code=#{cardCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user_info (user_id, real_name, card_code, sex,create_time) VALUES (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sex,jdbcType=CHAR},#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select (select count(1) from t_user_info where user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}) countUserId, (select count(1) from t_user_info where card_code=#{cardCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) countCardCode from dual
